trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en grupp av relaterade avsnitt i en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections.
trans-unit.target: Inställningarna i konfigurationsfiler (till exempel Web.config-filen) är uppdelade i avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom vissa avsnitt relaterade, är det ofta praktiskt att gruppera dem i en avsnittsgrupp.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroup class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationSectionGroup klassen representerar den `sectionGroup` XML-element som används för att gruppera avsnitt när de har definierats i den `configSections` element i en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections).
trans-unit.target: Avsnittsgrupper kan kapslas (en avsnittsgrupp som kan innehålla andra avsnittsgrupper samt avsnitt).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into ConfigurationSectionGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: Följande exempel visar en `configSections` element som definierar tre kapslade avsnittsgrupper: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` konfigurationssystemet läser in inställningarna från konfigurationsfiler i ConfigurationSectionGroup-objekt.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a ConfigurationSectionGroup object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>och <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>egenskaper till avsnitt och avsnittsgrupper som ingår i ett ConfigurationSectionGroup-objekt.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du komma åt information från konfigurationsfiler finns <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>klass.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar deklarationen för detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ForceDeclaration kan tvinga en <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objekt som ska skrivas till en konfigurationsfil, även om det inte är obligatoriskt eftersom den har redan deklarerats i en överordnad fil.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar deklarationen för detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A> method forces this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>metoden tvingar detta <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>deklaration som ska skrivas till filen om `force` är `true`.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object is required by the system.
trans-unit.target: Om `force` är `false`, den här åtgärden kan ignoreras om den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objekt krävs av systemet.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ForceDeclaration kan tvinga en <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objekt som ska skrivas till en konfigurationsfil, även om det inte är obligatoriskt eftersom den har redan deklarerats i en överordnad fil.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required.
trans-unit.target: Dessutom kan det ta bort en grupp från en konfigurationsfil om gruppen inte krävs.

trans-unit.source: You might want to use the ForceDeclaration method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists.
trans-unit.target: Du kanske vill använda ForceDeclaration-metoden för att göra en konfigurationsfil fler bärbara från en dator till en annan, utan att bekymra sig om gruppdeklaration redan finns.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object must be written to the file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektet måste vara skrivna till filen, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object declaration is required.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt deklaration krävs.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> declaration is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den här <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> deklarationen är krävs, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object is declared.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt har deklarerats.

trans-unit.source: If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the IsDeclared property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om avsnittsgruppen deklareras i konfigurationsfilen, returnerar egenskapen IsDeclared `true`.

trans-unit.source: The IsDeclared property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file.
trans-unit.target: IsDeclared egenskapen returnerar `false` om det här avsnittet har ärvts från Machine.config eller en överordnad konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> is declared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den här <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> är deklarerad, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar egenskapen name för detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The Name property value is the name of the section group that does not contain the parent section groups.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för egenskapen Name är namnet på avsnittsgruppen som inte innehåller överordnade avsnittsgrupper.

trans-unit.source: The name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen name för detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the section group name associated with this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det avsnitt gruppnamnet som är associerade med den här <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SectionGroupName property value is the full path name of the section group, including the parent section groups..
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsvärdet SectionGroupName är den fullständiga sökvägen för avsnittsgruppen, inklusive överordnade avsnittsgrupper...

trans-unit.source: The section group name of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Avsnittet gruppnamnet för detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objekt som innehåller alla de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt som är underordnade detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objekt som innehåller alla de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt som är underordnade detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objekt som innehåller alla <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekt inom detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objekt som innehåller alla de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objekt inom detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Anger om aktuellt <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> instans ska serialiseras när objektet konfigurationshierarki serialiseras för angivna Målversionen av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Varje configuration avsnittsgrupp som skapas för den [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] och senare versioner måste uttryckligen åsidosätta den här metoden returnerar `true`, men endast om avsnittsgruppen är giltig för den angivna versionen av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Befintliga configuration avsnittsgrupper som har skapats för tidigare versioner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] behöver inte ändras.

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Bastypen innehåller en standardimplementering av den här metoden returnerar alltid `true`.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: Med andra ord om en konfiguration avsnittet grupp implementerare inte åsidosätts den här metoden, serialiseras som standard avsnittet konfigurationsgruppen för alla versioner av framework.

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Målversionen av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den aktuella avsnittsgruppen ska serialiseras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger typen för den här <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class is a derived type, the Type property will return the name of the derived type that extends the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: Om den här instansen av <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>klassen är en härledd typ, Type-egenskapen returnerar namnet på den härledda typen som utökar <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>klass.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The type of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Typ av detta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The section or group is already defined at another level.
trans-unit.target: Avsnittet eller gruppen har redan definierats på en annan nivå.
